articles.title: 2X FIFA World Cup Winner Alex Morgan Divulged “Massive” Details About Lionel Messi and Argentina Before Admitting FC Barcelona Fandom
articles.description: USWNT player Alex Morgan is a big fan of Lionel Messi. She wrote about his stardom in her biography titled Breakaway - Beyond the Goal.
articles.content:
Published 12/06/2022, 12:30 PM EST
Lionel Messi is one of the biggest players in the world. Even big soccer players appeared to be his fans. He has a plethora of records on his name. Messi has had a long and decorated career since his debut in 2004. ... [2908 chars]

articles.title: Maradona's former home opens doors for fan fest during Argentina's World Cup games
articles.description: The new owners of a house Diego Maradona once bought for his parents in Buenos Aires have been staging events in the premises so that Argentine fans can celebrate the national team's triumphs at the World Cup in Qatar.

articles.description: Paulo Dybala hasn’t played a minute at FIFA World Cup despite the injuries afflicting Argentina on their turbulent run to the quarterfinals and the declining form of forward Lautaro Martinez.
